The value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] when the tag is available in the current reader session. When a tag is removed from an RF field, it becomes unavailable.

# isAvailable

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether a detected tag is available.

## Declaration

```swift
var isAvailable: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] when the tag is available in the current reader session. When a tag is removed from an RF field, it becomes unavailable.
title: isAvailable
